summary: New arrow type that can be crafted at any forge under the misc category, this requires the steel smithing perk.  Sadly this doesn't have SkyRE compatibility yet; if you can make it compatibly please do.
descriptionHtml:
[COLOR=#953734][FONT=Comic Sans MS][SIZE=7]Silver Arrows[/SIZE][/FONT][/COLOR]
[FONT=Comic Sans MS][SIZE=5][COLOR=#953734]A new type of arrows, silver. They do additional damage to undead, werewolves and ghosts. They can be crafted under the misc category at any forge. This was requested mellophonist:[/COLOR][COLOR=#c0504d] [/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT][URL=http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/topic/1390565-silver-arrows/][FONT=Comic Sans MS][SIZE=5][COLOR=#c0504d]http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/topic/1390565-silver-arrows/[/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT][/URL]
[COLOR=#953734][FONT=Comic Sans MS][SIZE=5]
[/SIZE][/FONT][/COLOR]
[COLOR=#953734][FONT=Comic Sans MS][SIZE=5]
[/SIZE][/FONT][/COLOR]
[COLOR=#953734][FONT=Comic Sans MS][SIZE=5][U]Permissions[/U][/SIZE][/FONT][/COLOR]
[COLOR=#953734][FONT=Comic Sans MS][SIZE=5]You can use these arrows in any of your own mods, if you know how can you please make this SkyRE compatible.[/SIZE][/FONT][/COLOR]
[COLOR=#953734][FONT=Comic Sans MS][SIZE=5]
[/SIZE][/FONT][/COLOR]
[COLOR=#953734][FONT=Comic Sans MS][SIZE=5][U]Credits[/U][/SIZE][/FONT][/COLOR]
[COLOR=#953734][FONT=Comic Sans MS][SIZE=5]Bethesda[/SIZE][/FONT][/COLOR]
[COLOR=#953734][FONT=Comic Sans MS][SIZE=5]Blender[/SIZE][/FONT][/COLOR]
[COLOR=#953734][FONT=Comic Sans MS][SIZE=5]GIMP[/SIZE][/FONT][/COLOR]
[COLOR=#953734][FONT=Comic Sans MS][SIZE=5]Nifskope[/SIZE][/FONT][/COLOR]
